txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
Destroyed a totem in Ost Magol
Destroyed the second totem in Ost Magol
Destroyed the third totem in Ost Magol
Orcs have been defiling Ost Magol with the totems of their dark leaders.
Destroyed the fourth totem in Ost Magol

'The ancient ruins of Ost Magol hold an ancient power to them, one I do not understand. The Orcs that are searching the ruins are looking for something, perhaps a way to tap into that power and use it for their foul purposes.\n\n'Search the ruins and find the totems they have placed to channel that power, then destroy them.'
Totems can be found in the ruins of Ost Magol.\n\nAldbéort asked you to venture into Ost Magol and destroy the Orc-totems within.
'The totems have been destroyed, and Ost Magol is secure for now. I have no doubt the Orcs will return, but that is tomorrow's problem.'
Aldbéort is in Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear the Orc totems in Ost Magol have been destroyed.

'The Orcs within Ost Magol cannot be trusted. I do not know what dark trickery they wish to perform within the shadows of the ruins, and I wish never to learn.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Destroy a totem in Ost Magol
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
Destroy the fourth totem in Ost Magol
